name: John and the Emerald
description:
Find the secret emerald and discover new and exciting levels!

Controls:

Spacebar to shoot.

Arrow keys to move and jump.

Version 1.1 is here!

Fixes:

-More Backgrounds

-More Music

-Better Boss AI

-Window size stays the same

-Balanced Game Mechanics

-Bug Fixes

Version 1.1 release date: Dec 3 2014
